text: Elisa Pérez de las Heras (born 10 June 1947) is a Mexican equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Mexico Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 1971 Pan American Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Elisa Pérez de las Heras
